APPLICATION_FORM.TITLE: Application form
APPLICATION_FORM.DRAG_AND_DROP_INFO: You can move the table items by dragging them with the handle on the left side.
APPLICATION_FORM.CHANGE_APPLICATION_FORM_ITEMS_SUCCESS: Application form items were successfully changed

TYPES.COMBOBOX: Single value selection with opt. custom value

HIDDEN.IF_PREFILLED: If prefilled (self or other item, if dependency specified)
HIDDEN.IF_EMPTY: If empty (self or other item, if dependency specified)

WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.HEADER: Item is used to display customizable heading of the form. Can have any HTML content.
WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.SUBMIT_BUTTON: Button used to submit the form with a custom label. All other form items are checked on valid input before submission. If it fails, form is not sent.
WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.HTML_COMMENT: Item is used to display custom HTML content anywhere on the form. Useful for explanation descriptions, dividing parts of form, etc.
WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.TEXTFIELD: Editable text field useful to gather short text input, e.g. name, phone.
WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.VALIDATED_EMAIL: Special text field to gather and verify user`s email address. Input is checked on email address format. If a user enters a new value, then a validation email is sent. The application then can't be approved unless the provided email address is validated.
WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.SELECTIONBOX: Simple selection box with defined custom values that user can choose.
WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.USERNAME: Special text field to gather user`s login. It checks login availability on user input.
WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.PASSWORD: Two password fields to gather the user's new password. Input is never displayed. The user must type the same password in both fields.
WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.TEXTAREA: Editable text area useful to gather longer text input with linebreaks, e.g. comments, SSH key
WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.COMBOBOX: Selection box with defined custom values and one special option: "--custom value--", which allows users to input their text (as a simple text field).
WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.CHECKBOX: List of defined custom options with checkboxes. Selected values are gathered as a comma-separated string.
WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.RADIO: List of defined custom options with radio buttons. Single selection model. Value is stored as a string.
WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.TIMEZONE: Selection box with predefined values of UTC timezones.
WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.AUTO_SUBMIT_BUTTON: Button used to auto-submit the form with a custom label. All other form items are checked on valid input before submission. If validation fails (at least once) the user must submit the form manually. If it's OK, then the form is automatically submitted.
WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.EMBEDDED_GROUP_APPLICATION: The checkbox of real organization groups which the user can check and thus submit an application to these groups
WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.LIST_INPUT_BOX: Item is used to show list values
WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.MAP_INPUT_BOX: Item is used to show key - value pairs

APPLICATION_FORM_COPY_ITEMS.TITLE: Copy form items from organization / group
APPLICATION_FORM_COPY_ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: All form items from the selected group or organization will be added to yours.
APPLICATION_FORM_COPY_ITEMS.PRIVILEGE: You cannot copy the application form for this combination of organization and group
APPLICATION_FORM_COPY_ITEMS.NO_FORM: The selected entity has no form

APPLICATION_FORM_ADD_ITEM.TITLE: Add form item
APPLICATION_FORM_ADD_ITEM.FILL_NAME: Length of the name has to be between 1 to 128 characters

APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.TITLE: Edit form item
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.SHORT_NAME_DESCRIPTION: Internal item identification (used as a fallback when you forgot to set "Label" for some language).
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.SUBMIT_BUTTON_DISABLED_TOOLTIP: This item is required and hidden or disabled, but it has no prefilled value (Source and Federation attributes are empty)
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.INPUT_WIDGET_DESCRIPTION: Specify what input widget is used for this item.
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.DISPLAY_ON_APPLICATION_DESCRIPTION: Define on which application types is this item displayed.
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.CONTENT_DESCRIPTION: HTML formatted content of form item. It spans through all columns to full form width.
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.LABEL: Label
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.LABEL_DESCRIPTION: Label displayed to users to identify the item on the application form. If empty, "Short name" from basic settings is used as a fallback.
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.HELP_DESCRIPTION: Help text displayed to a user along with input widget.
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.ERROR_DESCRIPTION: Error message displayed to a user when when wrong value is entered.
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.REGEX_DESCRIPTION: A regular expression is used for item value validation (before submitting by user).
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.SOURCE_ATTRIBUTE_DESCRIPTION: Select attribute, which will be used to pre-fill form value. You can select also organization attributes.
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.DESTINATION_ATTRIBUTE_DESCRIPTION: Select attribute, where will be submitted value stored after accepting user`s application.
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.FEDERATION_ATTRIBUTE_DESCRIPTION: Select federation attribute to get pre-filed value from.
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.REQUIRED_DESCRIPTION: If checked, the user can`t submit an empty value (doesn't apply to non-editable fields).
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.OPTIONS_DESCRIPTION: Define possible options for selection in SELECTIONBOX, COMBOBOX, CHECKBOX, RADIO widgets. Empty options are not used.
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.UPDATABLE_DESCRIPTION: If set, the user can edit this item after submission.
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.HIDDEN_DESCRIPTION: When the item should be hidden during the submission.
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.HIDDEN_DEPENDENCY_DESCRIPTION: Other form item, which is used to decide, if this one should be hidden.
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.DISABLED_DESCRIPTION: When the item should be disabled during the submission.
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.DISABLED_DEPENDENCY_DESCRIPTION: Other form item, which is used to decide, if this one should be disabled.

APPLICATION_FORM_DELETE_MAIL.TITLE: Confirm delete action
APPLICATION_FORM_DELETE_MAIL.DESCRIPTION: Following mail definitions will be removed and users won't receive them anymore.

CREATE_ATTRIBUTE.ERROR_EMPTY_VALUE: You can't save an attribute with an empty value

DELETE_RESOURCE_TAG.TITLE: Confirm delete action
DELETE_RESOURCE_TAG.DESCRIPTION: Following tags will be deleted and won't be used to tag organization resources.

NOTIFICATIONS_EDIT_FOOTER.TITLE: Edit mail footer
NOTIFICATIONS_EDIT_FOOTER.FORMAT_HTML_NOT_AUTHORIZED: You are not authorized to create HTML footer, so you can create just plain text footer.
NOTIFICATIONS_EDIT_FOOTER.DESCRIPTION: This text will be added as a footer for all email notifications (plain text footer replacing {mailFooter} tag and HTML footer replacing {htmlMailFooter} tag in mail definition).
NOTIFICATIONS_EDIT_FOOTER.HINT: You don't have permission to edit email footer.

NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.EDIT_HINT: You don't have permission to edit notifications.
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.EMAIL_TYPE_DESCRIPTION_CREATE: Selected type of notification (action which triggers sending and who is notified).
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.EMAIL_TYPE_DESCRIPTION_EDIT: Type of notification (action which triggers sending and who is notified).
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.APPLICATION_TYPE_DESCRIPTION_CREATE: Select which application type will trigger sending.
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.APPLICATION_TYPE_DESCRIPTION_EDIT: Application type which will trigger sending.
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.SENDING_ENABLED_DESCRIPTION: If checked, a notification will be sent. Un-check it to temporarily disable sending.
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.FORMAT_INFO:
• when the HTML notification is filled then this one will be sent to a user
    • the plain text will be used as an alternative for the email clients that do not support HTML in email
  • don't forget to change both (HTML + plain text) formats when updating some of the formats
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.FORMAT_INFO_NOT_AUTHORIZED: You are not authorized to create HTML notification, so you can create just plain text notification.
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.SUBJECT: Subject
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.TAGS_DESCRIPTION: Following tags can be used in mail's subject and text and are replaced by actual data on sending. Just choose the place where you want the tag and click on the tag button. When no data for the tag is found, it's replaced by whitespace.
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.ACTOR_DESCRIPTION: user's login used when submitting application
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.EXTSOURCE_DESCRIPTION: user's identity provider when submitting an application
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.VONAME_DESCRIPTION: name of organization of application form
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.GROUPNAME_DESCRIPTION: name of group, if application form is for group membership
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.MAILFOOTER_DESCRIPTION: common mail footer defined by organization
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.HTMLMAILFOOTER_DESCRIPTION: common mail HTML footer defined by organization
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.ERRORS_DESCRIPTION: errors description, what happened while processing new application. Useful for organization administrators
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.CUSTOMMESSAGE_DESCRIPTION: optional message passed by administrators when rejecting an application
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.FROMAPPITEMNAME_DESCRIPTION: value of a form item in user's application. You MUST specify the itemName, e.g. {fromApp-mail} will print value of item with short name 'mail' from user's application.
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.FIRSTNAME_DESCRIPTION: users first name taken from application form or Perun
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.LASTNAME_DESCRIPTION: users last name taken from application form or Perun
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.DISPLAYNAME_DESCRIPTION: users display name taken from application form or Perun
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.MAIL_DESCRIPTION: users preferred mail from application form or Perun
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.PHONE_DESCRIPTION: users phone from application form or Perun
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.LOGINNAMESPACE_DESCRIPTION: user's login in selected namespace, taken from registration form or Perun. You MUST specify the namespace, e.g. {login-einfra} will print user's login in einfra namespace.
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.MEMBERSHIPEXPIRATION_DESCRIPTION: membership expiration date decided after membership creation or extension
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.VALIDATION_LINKS_DESCRIPTION: Works only for "Mail validation / user " mail type! Used to verify email address provided by users => verify application.
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.VALIDATIONLINK_DESCRIPTION: link for email address verification. Please make sure you set "Registrar URL" setting of your organization/group. If you don't specify authorization in "Registrar URL", you can use following options:
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.REDIRECTURL_DESCRIPTION: contains the URL parameter which was present during the application submission. If the application was initial, contains the value of the 'targetnew' URL parameter. If the application was extensional, contains the value of the 'targetexisting' parameter.
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.APPLICATION_LINKS_DESCRIPTION: Used to navigate users to the list of theirs applications.
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.APPGUIURL_DESCRIPTION: link to overview of submitted registrations for users. Please make sure you set "Registrar URL" setting of your organization/group. If you don't specify authorization in "Registrar URL", you can use following options:
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.APPLICATION_LINKS_ADMINISTRATOR_DESCRIPT: Used to navigate administrators to the registration detail, where they can check and approve or reject the application.
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.APPDETAILURL_DESCRIPTION: link to registration detail in administrative GUI. Please make sure you set "Registrar URL" setting of your organization/group. If you don't specify authorization in "Registrar URL", you can use following options:
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.PERUN_LINKS_ADMINISTRATOR_DESCRIPTION: Used to navigate administrators to the administrative GUI of Perun. Can be used for users to locate user detail too.
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.PERUNGUIURL_DESCRIPTION: link to administrative GUI. Please make sure you set "Registrar URL" setting of your organization/group. If you don't specify authorization in "Registrar URL", you can use following options:
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.USER_INVITATIONS_DESCRIPTION: Following tags can be used on user invitation template
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.USER_INVITATIONS_VONAME_DESCRIPTION: name of organization to invite user into
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.USER_INVITATIONS_GROUPNAME_DESCRIPTION: name of Group to invite user into
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.USER_INVITATIONS_MAILFOOTER_DESCRIPTION: common mail footer defined by organization
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.USER_INVITATIONS_HTMLMAILFOOTER_DESCRIPT: common mail HTML footer defined by organization
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.INVITATIONLINK_DESCRIPTION: link to registration form. Please make sure you set "Registrar URL" setting of your organization/group. If you don't specify authorization in "Registrar URL", you can use following options:
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.INVALID_NOTIFICATION: Notification with selected type and selected application type already exist.

NOTIFICATIONS_COPY_MAILS.TITLE: Copy mail notifications from Organization/group
NOTIFICATIONS_COPY_MAILS.DESCRIPTION: All mail definitions will be added to yours.

DELETE_ATTRIBUTE_DEFINITION.TITLE: Confirm delete action
DELETE_ATTRIBUTE_DEFINITION.TEXT_LINE1: Following attribute definitions will be removed.
DELETE_ATTRIBUTE_DEFINITION.WARNING: This action will also delete all assigned values
DELETE_ATTRIBUTE_DEFINITION.SUCCESS: Selected attributes have been deleted successfully

CHANGE_STATUS.TITLE: Change status
CHANGE_STATUS.VALID_DESCRIPTION: Member is properly configured and has access to all provided resources.
CHANGE_STATUS.INVALID_DESCRIPTION: Member has configuration error and DOESN'T have access to provided resources. You can check what is wrong by changing the member's status to ACTIVE. If possible, the procedure will configure all necessary settings by itself.
CHANGE_STATUS.EXPIRED_DESCRIPTION: Member didn't extend membership and might NOT have access to all services.
CHANGE_STATUS.DISABLED_DESCRIPTION: Member was manually disabled and DON'T have access to provided resources.
CHANGE_STATUS.CHANGE_VALID_TO_INVALID: Changing status to INVALID will prevent the member from accessing all services. INVALID members might not have the correct configuration (required by services) and have to be validated before accessing them.
CHANGE_STATUS.CHANGE_VALID_TO_EXPIRED: Changing status to EXPIRED might prevent the member from accessing some of the services (based on provided service's rules). EXPIRED status means, that member didn't extend his membership in the organization, but it's still possible for him to do so.
CHANGE_STATUS.CHANGE_VALID_TO_DISABLED: Changing status to DISABLED will prevent the member from accessing all of the services. DISABLED status means that the member is archived and is not allowed to any services.
CHANGE_STATUS.CHANGE_NO_VALID_TO_VALID: Changing status to ACTIVE will trigger attribute validation. If successful, the member will have access to all services. If not, see the displayed error message and do a manual configuration of invalid attributes.
CHANGE_STATUS.CHANGE_NO_VALID_TO_INVALID: INVALID status means there is a configuration error, which prevents the member from accessing provided services.
CHANGE_STATUS.CHANGE_NO_VALID_TO_EXPIRED: EXPIRED status means, that member didn't extend his membership in the organization, but it's still possible for him to do so.
CHANGE_STATUS.CHANGE_NO_VALID_TO_DISABLED: DISABLED status means that the member is archived and is not allowed to any services. Member can't enable/extend membership by himself.

REMOVE_GROUP_FROM_RESOURCE.TITLE: Confirm delete action
REMOVE_GROUP_FROM_RESOURCE.DESCRIPTION: Following groups will be removed from the resource.
REMOVE_GROUP_FROM_RESOURCE.SUCCESS: Selected groups were removed from the resource

ASSIGN_GROUP_TO_RESOURCE.TITLE: Assign group
ASSIGN_GROUP_TO_RESOURCE.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Selected groups were assigned to the resource
ASSIGN_GROUP_TO_RESOURCE.ADD_TOOLTIP: You don't have privileges to perform this action for one or more groups.
ASSIGN_GROUP_TO_RESOURCE.ASYNC_ON_HINT: Selected group(s) assignment is executed asynchronously (switched to PROCESSING state and waiting for assignment to run in the background)
ASSIGN_GROUP_TO_RESOURCE.ASYNC_OPT_DESCRIPTION: If selected, group(s) assignment is executed asynchronously (switched to PROCESSING state and waiting for assignment to run in the background). Otherwise, a synchronous assignment is executed.
ASSIGN_GROUP_TO_RESOURCE.ACTIVE_ON_HINT: Groups will be assigned to the resource with ACTIVE status
ASSIGN_GROUP_TO_RESOURCE.ACTIVE_OFF_HINT: Group(s) will be assigned to the resource with INACTIVE status (if assigning with subgroups, subgroups will be assigned with ACTIVE status), members of INACTIVE group(s) will not be able to access services until activation.
ASSIGN_GROUP_TO_RESOURCE.AUTO_SUBGROUPS_OFF_HINT: The resource will be assigned only to selected groups and will not propagate to their subgroups
ASSIGN_GROUP_TO_RESOURCE.AUTO_SUBGROUPS_ON_HINT:
All current and future subgroups will be assigned to this resource
In the case of 'members' groups this extends to all groups of its organization

ADD_SERVICE_DESTINATION.TITLE: Add destination
ADD_SERVICE_DESTINATION.DESCRIPTION: Please add destinations for service configuration delivery. New service configuration can be performed directly on the facility (dest. type HOST) or sent to URL or by an email.
ADD_SERVICE_DESTINATION.INVALID_DESTINATION: The specified value for the selected destination type is invalid.
ADD_SERVICE_DESTINATION.USE_FACILITY_HOST: Use names of all facility's hosts
ADD_SERVICE_DESTINATION.PROPAGATION_TYPE_PARALLEL: PARALLEL - Data for all destinations and one service are pushed in parallel.
ADD_SERVICE_DESTINATION.PROPAGATION_TYPE_DUMMY: DUMMY - Service provisioning data is generated by Perun, but not pushed to destination. Destinations can pull data by themselves.

ADD_GROUP_RESOURCES.TITLE: Assign resources
ADD_GROUP_RESOURCES.FILTER: Filter by Id, name or description
ADD_GROUP_RESOURCES.ADD_PERMISSION_TOOLTIP: You don't have permission to assign some of the selected resources.
ADD_GROUP_RESOURCES.ASYNC_ON_HINT: Selected resource(s) assignment is executed asynchronously (switched to PROCESSING state and waiting for assignment to run in the background)
ADD_GROUP_RESOURCES.ACTIVE_ON_HINT: Resources will be assigned to a group with ACTIVE status
ADD_GROUP_RESOURCES.ACTIVE_OFF_HINT: Resources will be assigned to a group with INACTIVE status, members will not be able to access services until activation
ADD_GROUP_RESOURCES.AUTO_SUBGROUPS_OFF_HINT: Resources will be assigned only to this group and will not propagate to its subgroups
ADD_GROUP_RESOURCES.AUTO_SUBGROUPS_ON_HINT:
All current and future subgroups will be assigned to selected resource(s)
In the case of 'members' groups, this extends to all groups of this organization
